item.description:
The holidays are coming!  Join us to learn or brush up on your foxtrot and swing!

No experience required and no partner required.  Just come to have fun, meet new people, and learn some new moves.

This session will be 5 classes over the course of 6 weeks.  Each lesson will build on the previous one, so please be considerate of your fellow dancers and try not to miss any- if you miss a lesson you may fall behind and take time away from the rest of the group.

Cost is $10/class, and we ask that you pay for the entire 5 classes upfront to make it worth our instructor Christine's time.

8 people minimum required.

Dates: 11/11, 11/18, 12/2, 12/9, 12/16
item.how_to_find_us: The entrance is not on Cottage Ave. Park in the Fours lot; the entrance is in the alley to the left of the Fours. The studio sign says "Danceworks."

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Get Dancing for the Holidays!
